message: Just wait till Arashi finds out that Ango tried to r*pe Hana

If Arashi finds out and tries to beat Ango, then Ango can beat the crap out off him easily. I mean Arashi is just an ordinary highschool student while Ango been training since he was a kid. If Arashi actually beats Ango then that’s just straight out bullshit. But I guess they wouldn’t let them fight against each other if they actually try and something unexpected would happen that they get distracted from fighting each other.
